title: Atelier Lydie & Suelle ~The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings~ + Bonus DLC
body:
Atelier Lydie & Suelle ~The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings~ + Bonus DLC


Genres/Tags: RPG, Third-person, 3D, Japanese
Companies: Gust / Tecmo Koei
Languages: ENG/MULTI3
Original Size: 11.8 GB
Repack Size: from 4 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]

  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, partially compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Atelier.Lydie.and.Suelle.The.Alchemists.and.the.Mysterious.Paintings-CODEX ISO release: codex-atelier.lydie.and.suelle.the.alchemists.and.the.mysterious.paintings.iso (12,717,522,944 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature – you may skip downloading and installing of credits video and videos for Japanese/Chinese users
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 11.8 to 4~5.2 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 10-20 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 20 GB (~25 GB during installation)
  • Repack uses ZTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Lydie and Suelle are twin sisters, who are also alchemists, living in Merveille, the capital of Kingdom of Adalet, and they aim to make their atelier the best atelier in the kingdom.

One day, they find a Mysterious Painting with a strange and wonderful world inside of it, full of rare materials for their alchemy. This discovery is sure to become the very key to realizing their dream.

A new Mysterious story to mark the 20th anniversary of the Atelier series!

Delve into the fantastic worlds of Mysterious Paintings together with Lydie and Suelle!
